thread.title: GRETCHEN CORLISS
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by GRETCHEN CORLISS

author: GRETCHEN CORLISS
title: GRETCHEN CORLISS
text:
I am an old person. Feeble and without my automobile any more. Having my orders from Easy Comforts delivered automatically means I do not have to remind myself to reorder or find a ride to the store to get the things I need. I can enjoy my time with friends or playing Bridge instead. What can be said? When I lose the ability to do the things that I took for granted, life goes on with the help of Easy Comforts. Gretchen Corliss
.
